ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Burynai Bundt Cake Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: My thinking is simply that enough effort went into that foraging page that if the cake were a foraged item, it would have been noted. While the oven theory
ygData.messageBody:
My thinking is simply that enough effort went into
that foraging page that if the cake were a foraged
item, it would have been noted.

While the oven theory sounds very likely, no receipe
has surfaced...

Obviously we are missing something here....

My pet theory is there is a mail-bard somewhere in
Cabilis that will give the cake in exchange for yet
another quest and the cake and helmet are both
no-drop.

Tyunes of Rodcet Nife
The optimistic bard


--- JasonF <jasonf@...> wrote:
> Well it's entirely possible that it's not foraged at
> all. The guild could
> have given me some misinformation somehow. After
> all there *is* an oven way
> in the back of the Temple of Droga that has *no
> reason* to be back there
> except for quests. It's not like I'm going to
> travel all the way there just
> to hang out back around a bunch of scowling level
> 33-36 mobs making myself
> some pies. :-)
>
> [51 Minstrel] Crier (Half Elf) <Seekers of Norrath>
> ZONE: work
>
>
> > Below is a link to foraged items in kunark. No
> bundt
> > cake listed. Maybe we are looking in the wrong
> place?
> >
> > http://www.eqdruids.com/foraging.htm
> >
>
>
>
